application.name: Subtitle Editor
application.summary: GTK+2 tool to edit subtitles for GNU/Linux/*BSD

description.p: Subtitle Editor is a GTK+2 tool to edit subtitles for GNU/Linux/*BSD. It can be used for new subtitles or as a tool to transform, edit, correct and refine existing subtitle. This program also shows sound waves, which makes it easier to synchronize subtitles to voices.
